title: Quorn al limone with rosemary roast potatoes
ingredients: ['4 large potatoes, peeled and chopped into 1 to 2cm cubes', '5 to 7 sprigs fresh rosemary', 'olive oil', '120ml rapeseed oil', '2 lemons', '60ml Italian white wine', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 pinch dried Italian herbs', "1/2 bag QuornÂ® 'chicken' pieces", '25g Stilton cheese']
